keywords.DESCRIPTION: Triggered every time a Skill card is played.
Some cards can spend #yEarth #yEssence to active #yEarth #yRite which has more powerful effect.
Costs a corresponding number of #yEarth #yEssence to activate.
Spend a corresponding number of #yShadows to activate.

If you have enough #yEnergy, NL it will be spent to activate additional effects NL (Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.) NL TIP: Cost altering effects do not apply to Enhance unless you have less Energy than the Enhance cost. NL Enhance effects may activate from autoplay effects if you have the correct energy amount.

If you do not have enough #yEnergy, NL it can be played as a Skill card instead for the #yAccelerate cost. NL Only the #yAccelerate effects will activate if played in this way. (Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.) NL TIP: The card will change to a Skill if you have less energy than the original cost, affecting cost reduction effects.

If you do not have enough #yEnergy, cards with Crystallize can be played as a Power card instead for the #yCrystallize cost. NL Only the #yCrystallize effects will activate if played in this way. (Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.) NL TIP: The card will change to a Power if you have less energy than the original cost, affecting cost reduction effects.
Trait. NL Represented by #yBelphomet. Generally good at making tokens.
Select one or more cards or effects. Different effects will activate depending on the cards chosen.

Automatically adds the card to your hand or does certain effects if certain conditions have been met. #yInvocation will only activate once for each copy of a card per turn, even if you have multiple copies in your deck.
Trait. NL Represented by the #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree, which can trigger certain effects.
Trait, short for Artifact. NL Unique to #yPortalcraft. Play with other #yAF cards to trigger certain effects.
If you already have #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree active, you draw 1 card when another #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree is played.
Right click the card with Fusion effect to Exhaust specific cards to trigger effects. Can only be performed on an individual card with Fusion once per turn.
Trait. NL Unique to #yRunecraft. Has certain effects when played alongside other Mysteria cards. Represented by #yAnne and #yGrea.
Trait. NL Unique to #ySwordcraft. Has certain effects when played alongside other Levin cards. Represented by #yAlbert.

Activates if your turn number is equal to or greater than #yUnion #yBurst value listed on the card. Can be upgraded multiple times to reduce the value. NL TIP: Play it when the value is 0 during combat.
#yExhaust an Attack card from your discard pile and gain #yShadows.

Select the corresponding number of Attack cards in your hand to remove from this combat and gain #yShadows. These cards are considered played this combat but do not trigger Last Words. NL TIP: Best used with Reanimate.
Increases when playing and #yDestroying cards or triggering specific effects. Spend #yShadows to trigger #yNecromancy effects.
Randomly add a copy of 1 of the highest-cost Attacks played this combat equal to the Reanimate value to your hand, and it costs 0 this turn. NL (Won't trigger on Reanimated cards with #yReanimate 0.)
Effects that trigger when the card is #yExhausted or under other special circumstances.
The count reduces by 1 at the beginning of your turn. Will lose its original effects and trigger specific effects when the #yCountdown reaches 0.
#yVengeance becomes active once your HP is at or below 50%. Certain cards have effects triggered by #yVengeance.
#yWrath is active when you have taken damage or lost HP at least 7 times in a combat. Certain cards have effects triggered by #yWrath.
#yAvarice is active when at least 6 cards have been drawn from your draw pile in a turn. Certain cards have effects triggered by #yAvarice. You lose this effect at the end of your turn.
Heal HP equal to the damage dealt. (Lose this effect at the start of next turn)
#yResonance is active when your draw pile has an even number of remaining cards. Certain card have effects triggered by #yResonance.

Cards with #yManeuver can't be played directly. If another Attack with a cost greater than or equal to the #yManeuver value is played while this card is in hand, the Attack card will lose its effects and #yExhaust, then this card can be played. If this card is #yExhausted, the Attack card returns to your hand and costs 0 this turn. NL TIP: Avoid playing cards that cost more than the Manuever value if one is in your hand.

Passive: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Gain 6 #yBlock. If #yResonance is active or you have the Power #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree, summon a new #yCannon #yHermit #yCrab with half of the current stats (rounded up). NL When #yEvoked, deal damage and gain #yBlock repeatedly until its Health reaches 0.
Reduce damage from Powers and similar effects to 0.

#ySkybound #yArt effects activate if your turn number is equal to or greater than the #ySkybound #yArt value. Can be upgraded multiple times, and each time the #ySkybound #yArt value of the cards decreases by 1.  TIP: Play it when the value is 0.

#ySuper #ySkybound #yArt effects are powerful and activate if your turn number is equal to or greater than the #ySuper #ySkybound #yArt value. Can be upgraded multiple times, and each time the #ySuper #ySkybound #yArt value of the cards decreases by 1. TIP: Play it when the value is 0.

Your #yRally count increases by 1 each time you summon an allied Follower or play an Attack card that isn't a #yStrike. #yRally effects activate if your #yRally count is equal to or more than the #yRally value.
Effects with #yLimit can only be activated once per combat.
1/1 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 3 times its Attack to a random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/2 NL Passive: Apply #yWeak equal to Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/1 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 5 times its Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/1 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 2 times its Attack and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.

5/6 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 2 times its Attack, gain #yBlock equal to Attack next turn and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/4 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 3 times its Attack, summon a #yKnight and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.

3/3 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 3 times its Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Next turn, gain #yEnergy. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0, gain #yEnergy immediately.

1/1 NL Passive: Apply 1 #yVulnerable, deal damage equal to 3 times its Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0

3/2 NL Passive: Apply #yVulnerable equal to Attack and deal damage equal to 3 times its Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Next turn, gain #yEnergy . NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0, gain #yEnergy immediately.
2/3 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 2 times its Attack and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
Enemy, has approximately 30 HP. Puts a #yDutiful #ySteed into your hand when killed.
Refers to #yGilded #yBlade, #yGilded #yGoblet, #yGilded #yBoots, and #yGilded #yNecklace.
Trigger the followers' passive effects.
Undo the upgrade of this card for this combat after being played. The damage and #yBlock won't decrease. Can be upgraded by specific effects again. NL Remains upgraded between combats.

This card will disappear for the rest of this combat once played. If this card is an #yAmulet, it won't go to the discard pile after its #yCountdown reaches 0 and will instead disappear during this combat.
8/8 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to Attack (affected by #yStrength) to a random enemy, gain #yBlock equal to Health (affected by #yDexterity) at the end of your turn.
6/6 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to Attack (affected by #yStrength) to a random enemy, gain #yBlock equal to Health (affected by #yDexterity) at the end of your turn.
Choose either #yAmbush or #yAttack by the end of your turn. Choosing #yAmbush will not trigger passive effects and will gain 1 Attack. Can't choose #yAmbush if passive effects have been triggered.
Trait. 24th Expansion Edge of Paradise cards, from The Empyreal Inn story. Represented by #yTaketsumi.

2/2 NL Passive: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to 3 times its Attack to a random enemy and lose 1 Health. Add a #yGlittering #yGold to your hand. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until Health reaches 0.

3/3 NL Passive: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to 2 times its Attack to a random enemy and lose 1 Health. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until Health reaches 0. NL Whenever you play a #yGlittering #yGold, #yCommand this #yFollower.
Trait. Many #yHeroic cards have #yDistress #yCall abilities, allowing them to spring into action and come to the rescue!

#yDistress #yCall effects activate when at least one of the following conditions is met: NL You have taken damage since the end of your last turn. NL Your current HP is no greater than 25% of your max HP. NL You are currently afflicted with a debuff (such as #yWeak or #yVulnerable). NL You have a #yCurse in your hand or #yStatus that is not an #yEvolution #yPoint.
Trait. 27th Expansion Eightfold Abyss: Azvaldt cards. Represented by the Convicts and Enforcers of the Prison of Azvaldt.

1/1 NL Passive: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to 3 times its Attack to a random enemy and lose 1 Health. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until Health reaches 0. NL When Health reaches 0, put a #yGilded #yBoots into your hand.
Trait. 28th Expansion Academy of Ages cards, from the Lessons in Lainecrest story. Represented by cards such as #yLucius.
Overflow becomes active when you gain 3 Overflow points. You gain [E] at the start of every turn.
When you gain 3 Overflow points while Overflow is active, Full Overflow becomes active for you. Gain [E] [E] at the start of every turn.
Armed. The trait used by Light Tenryu, the protagonist of Shadowverse Flame. Armed cards can gain this trait multiple times, gaining 1 Block each time when played.
Chess Runecraft cards used by Shion Otosaka. Has additional effects when played alongside other Chess cards. Revolves around summoning as many #yMagical #yPawns as possible.
The eight heroes of Shadowverse from the Kingdom of Aleister. Represented by #yArisa, #yErika, #yIsabelle, #yRowen, #yLuna, #yUrias, #yEris and #yYuwan.

1/1 NL Passive: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to its Attack to a random enemy, gain Block equal to its Health and lose 1 Health. NL Does NOT lose health if it's Attack or Health is at least 20. NL When #yEvoked, summons a copy of itself.
At the end of your turn, if you've played a card that costs 2 or less, deal 10 damage to a random enemy. NL If you've played a card that costs 2 or more, deal 18 damage to ALL enemies.
Additional effects are triggered when there are at least that many Loot cards in the Exhaust pile.
Gains additional effects when upgraded, or upgrades itself under certain conditions. The upgraded card reverts back after being played in combat.
A 10 card deck containing expensive but extremely powerful Attacks.
A 13 card deck containing single copies of very powerful cards.
